Name: Perfectly Paired cocktail
Ingredients: Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Flute glass .
Prepare garnish of cinnamon powder and pear wedge.
Garnish with pear wedge on rim and dust with cinnamon powder.
Review: This autumnal champagne cocktail has notes of tart orchard fruit with vanilla and cinnamon laced with grassy cachaça.
History: Created in 2015 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Perfectly Paired cocktail contains 119 calories
